attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am doing this petition to keep madelenes profile kept in the media so people still are aware tat the story must stay top priority in the media and for mr blair to make a direct appeal for madelines return

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/madeleineposter/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
